original_text: Whoever wants to keep his life safe will lose it. But whoever gives his life to serve me will have true life.’
korean_text: 자기 목숨을 얻는 자는 잃을 것이요 나를 위하여 자기 목숨을 잃는 자는 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever wants to keep his life safe
But whoever gives his life to serve me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나를 위해 자기 목숨을 내어주는 사람은
